description:
Soft Drift is a Speed Based Car Drift Game with Simple and Soft Graphics,

You must pass the levels in the short time given to you by drifting with your vehicle. You must have a quick and good reflex.
You must complete 21 Levels in a short time, You must collect all the Gas Cans in the Chapters.
You must hurry up!
The Car Is Running Out Of Gas Too Fast And Collect All The Gas Cans To Pass The Levels!
There are 21 levels designed differently from each other in the game.
name: Soft Drift
